item.title: About
item.description: Nestled in the heart of Toronto, Canada, Trajectory is more than just a workspaceâ€”it’s a hub for innovation, collaboration, and the pursuit of a safer AI-driven future. Designed specifically for professionals and researchers dedicated to AI safety, Trajectory provides a dynamic environment where creativity meets rigor, and groundbreaking ideas are nurtured to their full potential. At Trajectory, we understand the importance of advancing AI in a way that benefits humanity while safeguarding against potential risks.
